text: this stuffing let's face it is the best
part of Thanksgiving the fact that we
don't eat stuffing in on other holidays
is very strange because everybody says
that's my favorite thing and then they
never make it again for an entire year
not stuffing by dressing so it's cooked
outside the bird so it's nice and crusty
I don't stuff the bird with the stuffing
I do the stuffing separate and then once
I pull the turkey out I put the stuffing
in I like to pack the bird with stuffing
it's always a beautiful tradition to
stuff your turkey and I think it also
helped not getting the turkey to dry you
know for me there's there's a difference
between cooking stuffing inside the
turkey and outside of the turkey the
reason why I like to cook stuffing
outside of the turkey is because I like
to keep it moist when you when you take
stuffing and you put it inside the bird
you have no control over moisture really
which when you make chicken stock or
turkey stuffing you get that fat at the
top of it then you want to like skim
that off before use it don't incorporate
that into your stuffing and that's how
you get that like in the bird you know
turkey flavor which is so distinctive
delicious stuffing is it's got to be

mean it's just got to be my stuffing
typically has butternut squash mushrooms

mistake maybe
is not put enough fat so you get the fat
